SENT.plain: Mobile atheroma in the proximal aorta is a risk factor for brain complication after cardiovascular operation
We report a new technique of replacing the ascending and transverse aorta by establishing selective hypothermic antegrade cerebral perfusion
After cooling, cerebral vessels are clamped and systemic perfusion is started
This technique was applied in 5 patients
All patients woke up normally and recovered without neurologic complication
